There were no other sightings in Las Vegas on or around November 27th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsevent 1 november 27 420pm approx. saw a small white circle in the sky and stay constant then gradually dim out and disappear then slowly brighten up again and stay lit for 4-5 seconds then dim out again. continued for 10-15 minutes as i drove down the 15s just about an hour out of vegas before you hit the mountains. event 1 jan 1 2001. small white light in the sky. saw the light while i was in los angeles and as i drove to irvine the same light was still there the whole way as i drove. photo snapped in irvine of the same light i saw all the way from vegas. looks exactly like the one i saw in vegas. time was about 4-5am with other people to witness. no alcohol btw. i also have multiple photos of these but these are the clearest. i took it will my cell phone cam. images have been altered slightly by photoshop but just brightness only.
